description:
Since the founding of The Becker Law Firm, L.P.A., attorney Michael F. Becker and the members of our legal team have worked diligently to build a reputation as one of the Cleveland area's leading medical malpractice law firms. Today, we have expanded by opening a branch law office in Elyria. At both of our locations, the residents of northern Ohio who have suffered needlessly due to negligence can seek our assistance in pursuing compensation for birth injuries and other incidents of medical malpractice.

In addition to assisting clients as they seek justice after suffering injuries, we also help clients prepare for eventualities. We offer help creating guardianships, conservatorships and special needs trusts, which can all help give families peace of mind when concerns about the future care of loved ones arise.

Whether you sustained an injury, you find yourself permanently disabled or your child suffered a birth injury, the attorneys at The Becker Law Firm, L.P.A., have the experience you need on your side. By arranging a free initial consultation at our law office in Elyria, you can discover why so many in the region have turned to us for help during some of life's most difficult moments.
